cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on Small Business on October 14, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8844, STEP Improvement Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 149 (Thursday, September 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. EVANS:
H.R. 8844.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1
``The Congress shall have Power to . . . provide for the .
. . general Welfare of the United States; . . .''
[Page H7882]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

title: STEP Improvement Act of 2022
